I bought these pants for a 70s-themed party that I was invited to last minute. They arrived super fast, which was great! The length is just right, and the price is decent. However, they’re way too thin, which makes them unflattering. The material felt almost see-through and didn’t have the quality I was hoping for. I had high expectations, but sadly, I’ll be returning them. They could work for someone who doesn’t mind the thin fabric, but if you’re looking for a structured or more flattering fit, these might not be it.
I ABSOLUTELY LOVED these bell bottoms. Got a ton of compliments. Material was soft, stretchy, but was a bit too long. I am 5’5/150 lbs and got a size M.
The pants are super comfy and cute. Definitely size down. I could gotten away with small, but the medium fit great also. Really pulled my 70's look together.
You can see through them when you bend over. Really sucks, the only way I can wear these is if I wear a long shirt or sweater That covers my bottom. I don't recommend getting these.
Nice design, but very thin and cheap material.

I really liked the design on one i got. They feel soft and comfy not thick though it like light leggings. It fits well too gives that nice curve and flair. Super cute! Will be back for more! 5'2 and 103 lbs, small fits very nice. They were really long at first BUT SHRINK IN DRYER and now they are perfect. They roll down as they don't have a waist band, just normal fabric like the res of the pants, but if I was a little thicker, I don't think they would fall down. I love western/70's retro pants and these are great. They work for both everyday wear, and special occasions.

These pants were perfect for my 70s theme party invite. The pants fit great, I love the flare it’s perfect width. However, the material is thin and can see my under clothes. So make sure to wear a long shirt.

These are soft and comfy but so long. I washed them before trying on because I could tell they would fit - mistake bc I have to keep but they’re pretty long. I’m going To experiment with cutting them off. They’re soft and lightweight so if you’re tall these are a good choice for you!
These were so cute and soft. Wish the material was thicker. For the price, I definitely hoped for a little thicker material. If I bent over, you’d most likely see my undies.
Just the right stretch, makes your legs look long and your butt look great. Super comfy!

评论概述: Needs elastic band!!! n high heels.
评论详情: ive bought like 5 pairs of these pants in various colors. i love the stretch fabric, thin n breathable, love the patterns, love how the seams match up to flatter the butt. love all the colors!!! gaw thats why i keep buying them when they go in sale.  but! every single one i bought I've sliced open n put in a 2" elastic band around the waist. without it the pants are unwearable.  i have huge hips, long legs, n these fit like a glove if they have the elastic band n a pair of heels. without the elastic im constantly pulling the pants up in fear of them falling down.  value wise id be fine with this if these pants are $15-17. when they get up to $28-30 i don't bother buying them. n with too many washes (about 20/30 wash cycles) the color fades, fabric pills around the thighs, and the seams tear so i have to fix them after month 3/4.  will keep buying these till i find a company who makes them with the elastic band already in em still sporting these beautiful patterns.
I got so many compliments on these at disco night. They're soft and stretchy - form fitting. I'm 5'5" and  S fit perfect. I am buying another pair!
These pants are very colorful good quality good value very soft comfortably

Very thin fabric, had to size down for the waist to fit but became see thru. If you are tall, the pants are not long. I don’t care what other reviewers said. I am only 5’10 and they hit me at the ankle. Maybe my legs are actually longer than everyone else that said they were 5’10 and the pants were long.
I bought these for a costume but wear them to lounge in at least once a week. The bell bottoms are pretty big, and they are long
Perfect fit

I gave it five stars because it was everything I expected. Reading reviews before ordering, I knew they'd be quite thin. I also purchased a pair with colorful stripes, including white stripes on the pants. The part where the white stripes are, is just slightly see-through when you hold them up, HOWEVER, you can't tell when they are on. The black pants, and parts with color, are not see-through at all. The material reminds me of a pair of yoga bell bottoms that I purchased. I am 5'4, somewhere around 155 to 160 lbs. I also am thicker in the thighs, hips, and booty. (The angle of my photo just sucks) I ordered a size MEDIUM. Large would probably be a bit too loose and slip down. I did order some platform sandals and Boots to wear with all the flare and bell bottom pants that I've purchased. I DO step on them. Lol. I like them. I've already worn them out, for a casual outing, and around the house.

They arrived quickly. My personal pair is great material. Can not see thru and they fit perfectly for me. Amazon suggested a large for me but after reading I went with a medium. I will order more. I’m 5’8 165/170 lbs.

Bought for a 70s themed dance party. I was worried they might not stay up well as they are super stretchy but they worked great! Thin fabric, which was perfect in a hot venue, but won't keep you warm very long in cold weather!

I got a large and definitely could have sized down. These are really well made and stretchy. Colors are super vibrant as well. I wore them for rock climbing and had full flexibility the whole time and they are a thick enough material my undies did not show through them. 10/10

As most of the other reviews have stated, the pants are extremely loose in the hip area. There is not elastic to keep the pants where there need to be. If you have larger thighs, you will not be able to go down in size because the legs will be tight while the waist is loose. If you go down a size, I believe the pants will become see through. They are comfortable. I am extremely short, but these pants aren’t too long for me. I am not sure how they would fix a taller person. If you are willing to do a couple of alterations to make these pants work, these would be a good choice.
